ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ so so yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ so so
yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang
thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i
slad du/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du thams
cad shes pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das ci'i slad du/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ thams cad shes pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du lam gyi
rnam pa shes pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/
bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang
tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag
pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang de ltar rtogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gang de ltar rtogs pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshu rol kyi 'gram 'am/ pha rol gyi 'gram 'am/ gnyis kyi dbus na myi gnas na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe

tshu rol gyi 'gram 'am/ pha rol gyi 'gram 'am/ gnyis ka'i dbus na myi gnas shing shin tu rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs myi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dmyigs pa'i tshul du 'du shes su bgyid pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

gsog tu 'byin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor legs so legs so/ /rab 'byor de ni mying du yang chags pa yin/
mtshan mar yang chags pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mying du yang chags shing mtshan mar yang chags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs

kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mying du 'dzin tam mtshan mar 'dzin na de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mying dang mtshan mar 'dzin cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pas/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ngo / /rab 'byor gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar

'dzin cing de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar bzung na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed na de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags
pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ngo / /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang de ltar legs par bshad cing legs par bstan la chags pa dang ma chags pa de dag kyang mchis pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang

ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chags pa ni gang yin ma chags pa ni gang yin/ rab 'byor kyi smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs myi mkhas pa/ gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /

'du shes stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /'du byed stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /myig stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na

chags pa'o/ /rna ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /sna stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /lce stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /lus stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags

pa'o/ /yid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /sgra stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /dri stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /

ro stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /reg stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /chos stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags

pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags

pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na

chags pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na

chags pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa

zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /

lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /sa'i khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /chu'i khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /mye'i khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na

chags pa'o/ /rlung gi khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /nam mkha'i khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags

pa'o/ /ma rig pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /'du byed stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /myig dang gzugs stong pa
zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /skye mched drug stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na

chags pa'o/ /sred pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /len pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /srid pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /skye ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du

shes na chags pa'o/ /rga shi stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na

chags pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa

stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid stong

pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid stong
pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /'dus ma byas

stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na

chags pa'o/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar

'du shes na chags pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong

pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag

pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /dbang po
rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /stobs rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /bsam gtan rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du
shes na chags pa'o/ /tshad myed pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa

rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang /

smon pa myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /
gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes

na chags pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /byams pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /snying rje chen po stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na

chags pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras

bu stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /rang byang chub stong pa zhes

bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs myi mkhas pas/ 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /ma 'ongs

pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan

yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo myi dmyigs pa'i tshul du sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o/ /tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod na chags pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong

pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /rang bzhin

stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /rang gis mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa stong

pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba

rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /dbang po rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /stobs rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod na chags
pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na chags pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /bsam gtan rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /tshad myed pa
rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyod na chags pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin
rnams pa spyod na chags pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /so so yang dag

par rig pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /byams pa chen po la spyod na chags pa'o/ /snying rje chen po la spyod na chags pa'o/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod na chags pa'o/ /rgyun tu zhugs

pa'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /rang byang chub la

spyod na chags pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams kyi chags pa myed pa gang zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs la gzugs shes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /tshor ba la tshor ba zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /'du shes la 'du shes shes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /'du

byed la 'du byed ces bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /ma 'ongs pa'i

chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin pa zhig sbyin no/ /'di la sbyin pa 'di lta bu zhig sbyin no zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni
tshul khrims zhig bsrung ngo / /tshul khrims 'di lta bu zhig bsrung ngo zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni bzod pa zhig bsgom mo/ /bzod pa 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni brtson 'grus zhig
brtsom mo/ /brtson 'grus 'di lta bu zhig brtsam mo zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go/ /bsam gtan 'di lta bu zhig la mnyam par gzhag go zhe 'am/ bdag gis
ni shes rab zhig bsgom mo/ /shes rab 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni bsod nams zhig bskyed do/ /bsod nams 'di lta bu zhig bskyed do/ /bsod nams 'di tsam zhig bskyed
do/ /bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud par bya'o/ /bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o/ /bdag gis ni sems can yongs su smyin par bya'o zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems dpa' myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa ni rnam par rtog pa de lta bu thams cad/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong

pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin

stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myed cing myi rgyu ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
chags pa myed pa dag go/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis na/ byang chub sems
dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags par 'gyur ba yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad
ces smras so/ /ke'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos sems su 'du shes pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa

dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid

du 'du shes pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa

dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /

chos thams cad stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams su 'du shes pa dang /
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / dbang po rnams su 'du shes pa dang / stobs rnams su 'du shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su 'du shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
brgyad par 'du shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan rnams su 'du shes pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /

mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed par 'du shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams su 'du shes pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams su 'du shes pa dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su 'du shes pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / byams pa chen por 'du shes pa dang /
snying rje chen por 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad du 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su 'du shes par gyur te/ sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i

dge ba'i rtsa ba dag tu 'du shes nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mngon par bsdus te gcig tu btul nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing yongs su bsngo ba der yang 'du
shes pa de dag ni/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags pa ste/ chags pa de dag la chags par gyur na/ chags pa myed pa'i shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni ke'u shi ka gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /'du shes kyi

rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /'du byed kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /myig gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /

rna ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /sna'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /lce'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /lus kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /

yid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /sgra'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /dri'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /
ro'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /reg gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /chos kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su

bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs
su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /lce'i 'dus te
reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /

myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i

rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /chu'i khams
kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /mye'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin

yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /ma rig pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /'du byed kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar

myi nus so/ /rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /skye mched drug gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /reg

pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /sred pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /len pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /

srid pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /skye ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rga shi'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin

yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /brtson 'grus
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs

su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su

bsngo bar myi nus so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /mtha' las 'das

pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar

myi nus so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin

yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi

rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /
yang dag par spong pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo
bar myi nus so/ /stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang

bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi rang

bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /mthar

kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /

mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin

yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad
kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar
myi nus so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo
bar myi nus so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so/ /ke'u shi ka gzhan yang
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzhan zhig bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan tam/ yang dag par bskul lam/ yang dag par spro ba bskyed dam/
yang dag par dga' bar bya na/ yang dag par rjes su song ba'i yid kyis gzhan yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /yang dag par skul bar bya'o/ /yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o/ /yang dag

par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o/ /de yang ci nas kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes
bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba

dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni nang stong

pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la

spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam

par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni

don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur

ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do

zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin stong

pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa

nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur

ba dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dngos

po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba

dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams

la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams

la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang /
dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dbang po rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni stobs rnams la spyod do
zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang /
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa
rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bsam gtan rnams

la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni tshad myed pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la
spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mthar kyis

gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mngon par

shes pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang /
gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod do/ /zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya
bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang /

byams pa chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni byams pa chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni snying rje chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar

rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi

'gyur ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la

spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras

bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub la

spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang byang chub la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod do zhes
bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba
de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /yang dag par bskul bar bya'o/ /yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o/ /yang dag par dga' bar bskyed par bya ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am
rigs kyi bu mos gzhan bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /yang dag par bskul bar bya'o/ /yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o/ /yang dag par dga'

ba bskyed par bya'o/ /de yang dag par bstan pa de dang yang dag par bskul ba de dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya ba de dang / yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ba des gzhan yang dag par ston cing

yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed cing yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i tshe/ rma 'byung bar myi 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par bskul bas yang dag par bskul
ba yin te/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ / bam po lnga pa/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so/ /zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa'i rnam pa
de lta bu dag ston pa legs so legs so/ /rab 'byor de bas na khyod la chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba dag bstan par byas/ de dag shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung cig dang bstan
par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor
'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
mtshan mar yid la byed na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar gyur pa de srid du chags pa'o/ /gang yang 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chags pa thams cad dang bral ba de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de thams cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing /
yid la byas nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o/ /gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan
thos de dag dang de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang mtshan mar byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
bsngo na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de dag ni mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni zab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams
cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di
ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma byas/ mngon par 'du ma byas pa ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya bar myi nus so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mngon par
sangs ma rgyas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te/ chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do/ /rab 'byor chos kyi rang
bzhin gcig po gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no/ /gang rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o/ /gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'du ma byas pa'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos chos kyi rang bzhin gcig por rang bzhin ma yin pa ma byas pa mngon par 'du ma byas pa/ shes na chags pa'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong ma thos
ma rtogs rnam par ma shes/ mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems kyis ma shes so/ /gzugs kyis ma shes so/ /tshor bas ma shes so/ /'du shes kyis ma shes so/ /'du byed kyis ma shes so/ /
rnam par shes pas ma shes so/ /myig gis ma shes so/ /rna bas ma shes so/ /snas ma shes so/ /lces ma shes so/ /lus kyis ma shes so/ /yid kyis ma shes so/ /gzugs kyis ma shes
so/ /sgras ma shes so/ /dris ma shes so/ /ros ma shes so/ /reg gis ma shes so/ /chos kyis ma shes so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pas ma shes so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma shes
so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg
pas ma shes so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so/ /yid kyi 'dus
te reg pas ma shes so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so/ /
lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so/ /sa'i
khams kyis ma shes so/ /chu'i khams kyis ma shes so/ /mye'i khams kyis ma shes so/ /rlung gi khams kyis ma shes so/ /nam mkha'i khams kyis ma shes so/ /rnam par shes
pa'i khams kyis ma shes so/ /ma rig pas ma shes so/ /'du byed kyis ma shes so/ /rnam par shes pas ma shes so/ /mying dang gzugs kyis ma shes so/ /skye mched drug gis ma shes so/ /
reg pas ma shes so/ /tshor bas ma shes so/ /sred pas ma shes so/ /len pas ma shes so/ /srid pas ma shes so/ /skye bas ma shes so/ /rga shis ma shes so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pas ma shes so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu

phyin pas ma shes so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so/ /nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /stong pa nyid stong
pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /
chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /
ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ma shes
so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /dbang po rnams kyis ma shes so/ /stobs rnams kyis ma shes so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma shes so/ /'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pas ma shes so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /bsam gtan rnams kyis ma shes so/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis ma shes so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus ma shes so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas ma shes so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma shes so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs bcus ma shes so/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /byams pa chen pos ma shes so/ /snying rje chen pos ma shes so/ /sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis ma shes so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma shes so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so/ /
dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /rang byang chub kyis ma shes so/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyi shu brgyad do// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyid pa ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byed pa po myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs myi dmyigs

pa dang / tshor ba myi dmyigs pa dang / 'du shes myi dmyigs pa dang / 'du byed myi dmyigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa dang / myig myi dmyigs pa dang / rna ba myi dmyigs pa dang / sna myi dmyigs
pa dang / lce myi dmyigs pa dang / lus myi dmyigs pa dang / yid myi dmyigs pa dang / gzugs myi dmyigs pa dang / sgra myi dmyigs pa dang / dri myi dmyigs pa dang / ro myi dmyigs pa dang / reg myi

dmyigs pa dang / chos myi dmyigs pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa
myi dmyigs pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs
pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa dang / myig gi 'dus te

reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg
pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs pa dang / sa'i khams
myi dmyigs pa dang / chu'i khams myi dmyigs pa dang / mye'i khams myi dmyigs pa dang / rlung gi khams myi dmyigs pa dang / nam mkha'i khams myi dmyigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams
myi dmyigs pa dang / ma rig pa myi dmyigs pa dang / 'du byed myi dmyigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa dang / mying dang gzugs myi dmyigs pa dang / skye mched drug myi dmyigs pa dang /

reg pa myi dmyigs pa dang / tshor ba myi dmyigs pa dang / sred pa myi dmyigs pa dang / len pa myi dmyigs pa dang / srid pa myi dmyigs pa dang / skye ba myi dmyigs pa dang / rga shi myi dmyigs pa dang /

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs
pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyigs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang /

phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
myi dmyigs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa

dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa

dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa
dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myi dmyigs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba myi dmyigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myi dmyigs pa dang / dbang po myi dmyigs pa dang / stobs myi dmyigs pa dang /
byang chub kyi yan lag myi dmyigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi dmyigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa myi dmyigs pa dang / bsam gtan myi dmyigs pa dang / tshad
myed pa myi dmyigs pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myi dmyigs pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad myi dmyigs pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi
dmyigs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myi dmyigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa myi dmyigs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin myi dmyigs pa
dang / gzungs kyi sgo myi dmyigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myi dmyigs pa dang / myi 'jigs pa myi dmyigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rigs pa myi dmyigs pa dang / byams pa chen
po myi dmyigs pa dang / snying rje chen po myi dmyigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad myi dmyigs pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong

ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / rang byang chub myi dmyigs pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi dmyigs
pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas
rnam pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te
gzugs la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs
bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdugs ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/
bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs myed do/ /gal te tshor ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba sdug ces bya ba
'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed

pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba myed do/ /gal te 'du shes la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du shes rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces

bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du shes bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du shes

bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du shes sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'du

shes myed do/ /gal te 'du byed la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
gal te 'du byed bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed sdug ces bya 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag
pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'du byed myed do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa la myi spyod na shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am

sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am
sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa myed do/ /gal te myig la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

do/ /gal te myig rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces
bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am

myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i myig myed do/ /gal te rna ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar

myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi

rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam/ bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba myed do/ /gal te sna la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

do/ /gal te sna rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi
spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa'am/ sdug pa 'am myi
sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna myed do/ /gal te lce la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin la spyod do/ /gal te lce bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed

ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lce myed do/ /gal te lus la myi spyod na
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus bde zhes bya ba 'am/
sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
gal te lus sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba
'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus myed do/ /gal te yid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid

rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod do/ /gal te yid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod do/ /gal te yid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
yid myed do/ /gal te gzugs la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya

bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs myed do/ /gal te sgra la myi spyod na shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sgra rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sgra bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal
zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sgra bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
gal te sgra sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal
ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra myed do/ /gal te dri la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dri rtag ces bya

ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dri bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

gal te dri bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dri sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dri

myed do/ /gal te ro la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ro rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ro
bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ro bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ro sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am
bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ro myed do/ /gal te reg la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te

reg rtag ces bya 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i

reg myed do/ /gal te chos la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos

bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
gal te chos sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba
'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos myed do/ /gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
