khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nam mkha'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nam mkha'i khams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nam mkha'i khams
sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag
gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nam mkha'i khams myed do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal

zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug
bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa'i khams myed do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po drug pa/

gal te ma rig pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ma rig pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ma rig pa bde zhes
bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ma rig pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ma rig pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am
sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ma rig pa myed do/ /gal te 'du byed la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

gal te 'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi
sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am

sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'du byed myed do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi

rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par

'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa myed do/ /gal te mying dang gzugs la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mying dang gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar

myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mying dang gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mying dang gzugs
bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mying dang gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba

de lta bu'i mying dang gzugs myed do/ /gal te skye mched drug la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye mched drug rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye mched drug bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye mched drug bdag
ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye mched drug sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa ma myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par
'gyur ba de lta bu'i skye mched drug myed do/ /gal te reg pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg pa bdag ces bya ba

'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i reg pa myed do/ /gal te

tshor ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba

bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde
ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba myed do/ /gal te sred pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod do/ /gal te sred pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sred pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sred pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sred pa sdug ces bya ba
'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed
pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sred pa myed do/ /gal te len pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te len pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces

bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te len pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te len pa

bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te len pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur
ba de lta bu'i len pa myed do/ /gal te srid pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te srid pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ /shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te srid pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te srid pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag

myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te srid pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i srid pa myed do/ /gal te skye ba la

myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye ba bde zhes bya
ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/

sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i skye ba myed do/ /gal te rga shi la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rga shi

rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rga shi bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod do/ /gal te rga shi bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rga shi sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba

de lta bu'i rga shi myed do/ /gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi

spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces
bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am
myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug
bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /

gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bzod pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya
bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug

pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal
zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod do/ /gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/
myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /gal te bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya
bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am

myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar

myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/
sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /gal te nang stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal

zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nang

stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag

gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nang stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te phyi stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi stong pa

nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/
myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed

pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyi stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag

ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid
sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag

gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyi nang stong pa nyid myed do/ /gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stong pa

nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stong pa nyid stong
pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag

spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i bden
pa rnams myed do/ /gal te bsam gtan rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan rnams
bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur
ba de lta bu'i bsam gtan rnams myed do/ /gal te tshad myed pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshad myed pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag
ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshad myed pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod do/ /gal te tshad myed pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshad myed pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/
myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed
pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshad myed pa rnams myed do/ /gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod do/ /gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs myed
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sdug ces
bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag
gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad la myi spyod na shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa
brgyad bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi

spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa brgyad myed do/ /
gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bya ba 'am/
myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa
'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu

myed do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /

mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed

pa dang / smon pa myed pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /

smon pa myed pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug
bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed do/ /gal
te mngon par shes pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mngon
par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces
bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/
myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mngon par shes pa myed do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya

ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/
myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/

sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnams myed do/ /gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag

ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug
ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag
gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi sgo myed do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs bcu bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bya ba
'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag ba 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta
bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed do/ /gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi
rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod do/ /gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams sdug
ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag
gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i myi 'jigs pa rnams myed do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar

myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i so so yang dag par
rig pa rnams myed do/ /gal te byams pa chen po la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byams pa chen po rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byams pa chen po bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byams pa
chen po bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byams pa chen po sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur
ba de lta bu'i byams pa chen po myed do/ /gal te snying rje chen po la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag
ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te snying rje chen po bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
do/ /gal te snying rje chen po bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te snying rje chen po sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya
bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug
pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i snying rje chen po myed do/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes
bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya
bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur
ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myed do/ /gal te thams cad shes pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thams cad shes pa
nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thams cad shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thams cad shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thams
cad shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug
bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thams cad shes pa nyid myed do/ /gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la myi
spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag
ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod
na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug
par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes
bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag
pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed do// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang
yin pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal
te 'du shes yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'du shes ma yin
no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes
pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin

no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
myig yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de myig ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya

bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rna ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sna

ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lce ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus yongs su ma rdzogs
so zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lus ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid yongs su ma rdzogs
pa gang yin pa de yid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi dmyigs pa stong
pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs
su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs
pa gang yin pa de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dngos po myed pa'i
ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal
te yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs
pa gang yin pa de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dbang po rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so
zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dbang po rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de
ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stobs rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stobs rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de stobs rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi yan lag
rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i

bden pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i bden

pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

bsam gtan rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de bsam gtan rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshad myed pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya

bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad myed pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de tshad myed pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod do/ /gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams

yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gang rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar

myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod do/ /gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa dgu yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /

mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su ma rdzogs

pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs

so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin rnams ma

yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs

kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya

bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs pa

gang yin pa de myi 'jigs pa bzhi ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byams pa chen po yongs su

ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de byams pa chen po ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod do/ /gal te snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no zhes bya ba de

ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs so/ /zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thams cad shes pa nyid

yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su

ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams
la chags pa dang / ma chags pa legs par bstan pa 'di ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang / ma chags pa legs par bstan to/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te

tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'du shes chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'du byed chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te myig chags pa

'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sna chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

tshe/ gal te lce chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lus chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sgra chags pa 'am ma chags

pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dri chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chos chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha

rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes

bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags

pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags

pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na

gal te mye'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rlung gi khams chags pa 'am ma

chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te nam mkha'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

'du byed chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes

ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sred pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod
