de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te srid pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

gal te skye ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rga shi chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i tshe/ gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes

bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te phyi stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chen po stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i tshe/ gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'dus
ma byas stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mtha' las 'das

pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed

pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid chags

pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar

myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams chags pa

'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes

bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dbang po rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te stobs rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bsam

gtan rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshad myed pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags

pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya

bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te myi 'jigs

pa bzhi chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi chags pa 'am

ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te byams pa chen po chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te snying rje chen po chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te thams cad shes pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i tshe/ gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na gzugs chags pa 'am ma
chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /'du shes chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /'du byed chags
pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /myig chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /
rna ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /sna chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /lce chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /lus
chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /yid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /sgra
chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /dri chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /ro chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /
reg chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /chos chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags
pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
myed do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /yid kyi rnam
par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa
'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du
shes pa myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /
myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar
'du shes pa myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am
ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung
ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /sa'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /chu'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes
bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /mye'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rlung gi khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /nam mkha'i
khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /ma rig pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya
bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /'du byed chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /mying dang gzugs
chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /skye mched drug chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
myed do/ /tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /sred pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /len pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar
'du shes pa myed do/ /srid pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /skye ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rga shi chags pa 'am ma chags pa
zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes
bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du
shes pa myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid chags
pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya
bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed
do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /thog ma dang
tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rang bzhin
stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am

ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes

bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed
do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /dbang po rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /stobs rnams chags pa
'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa chags pa 'am ma chags
pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du
shes pa myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
myed do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa

myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya
bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bcu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig
pa bzhi chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /byams pa chen po chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /snying rje chen po chags pa 'am ma chags
pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu chags pa 'am ma chags
pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya
bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /rang byang chub chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /bla na myed
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su myi 'grib/
ma bstan kyang yongs su myi 'grib/ bstan kyang myi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang myi 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ chos zab
mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su myi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su myi 'grib/ bstan kyang myi 'phel ma bstan kyang myi 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mtsho'i bar du bzhugs shing nam mkha'i legs pa 'am ma legs pa brjod kyang / nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod pas yongs su 'phel ba myed do/ /
nyes pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa myed do/ /nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba myed do/ /nyes pa brjod kyang 'phel ba myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu
ma'i skyes bu ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba myed do/ /nyes pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa myed do/ /legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba myed do/ /nyes pa brjod kyang khong
khro bar 'gyur ba myed do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin ma bstan kyang de bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe/ zhum pa dang g.yeng bar myi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson par
bgyid cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar myi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom ste/ nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so/ /tshor ba ma mchis so/ /'du shes ma mchis so/ /'du byed ma mchis so/ /
rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni myig ma mchis so/ /rna ba ma mchis so/ /sna ma mchis so/ /lce ma mchis so/ /lus ma mchis so/ /yid ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni
gzugs ma mchis so/ /sgra ma mchis so/ /dri ma mchis so/ /ro ma mchis so/ /reg ma mchis so/ /chos ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni myig gi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i rnam par
shes pa ma mchis so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la

ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma

mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /lce'i
'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni sa'i
khams ma mchis so/ /chu'i khams ma mchis so/ /mye'i khams ma mchis so/ /rlung gi khams ma mchis so/ /nam mkha'i khams ma mchis so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis so/ /
nam mkha' la ni ma rig pa ma mchis so/ /'du byed ma mchis so/ /rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /mying dang gzugs ma mchis so/ /skye mched drug ma mchis so/ /reg pa ma mchis so/ /
tshor ba ma mchis so/ /sred pa ma mchis so/ /len pa ma mchis so/ /srid pa ma mchis so/ /skye ba ma mchis so/ /rga shi ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma

mchis so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /phyi stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /chen po
stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /thog ma

dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma

mchis so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /nam mkha'
la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ma mchis so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma mchis so/ /dbang po rnams ma mchis so/ /stobs rnams ma mchis so/ /
byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis so/ /bsam gtan rnams ma mchis so/ /tshad myed pa
rnams ma mchis so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ma mchis so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis so/ /
rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma mchis so/ /mngon par shes pa ma mchis so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ma mchis so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis
so/ /nam mkha' la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis so/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi ma mchis so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma mchis so/ /byams pa chen po ma mchis so/ /
snying rje chen po ma mchis so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so/ /
phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid ma mchis so/ /rang byang chub ma mchis so/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis so// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni/ phyag bgyi
bar 'os pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'i don du brtson par mos/ 'bad par mos/ rtsol bar mos pa dag ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can
rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smyin par 'tshal zhing / yongs su grol bar 'tshal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'

lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la gdeg par 'tshal ba'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni brtson 'grus chen
po thob pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi don tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal
ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ dpa' bo bsam gyis myi khyab/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal ba'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang
pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis
grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am 'gang bar myi gda'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang sems
can dben pa'i slad du ste/ de bzhin du gal te phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal
lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam til gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
kyang bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gyi khams la 'grib
pa 'am 'gang bar myi gda'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ bdag 'di skad du sems can rnams kyi slad

du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smyin par bgyi bar 'tshal zhing yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba lags shes mchi'o/ /

de nas dge slong gcig 'di snyam du gyur te/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba dang 'gag pa yang myed la/ tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yang yod/ shes rab kyi phung po yang
yod/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po yang yod/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang yod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang yod/ phyir myi 'ong
ba'i 'bras bu yang yod/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang yod/ rang byang chub kyang yod/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/ lan cig phyir
'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba yang yod/ dgra bcom pa yang yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyang yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/ sangs rgyas
dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos dkon mchog kyang yod/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na/ de gang la brtson par byed pa yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par
sems pa de ni/ nam mkha' stong pa la brtson pa'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba
dang / bskyab pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras
so/ /ke'u shi ka khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa brtsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis gang la
bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ji

skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par 'gyur ro/ /gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral
bar gyur na/ de la myi 'am myi ma yin pa glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /gang ji snyed du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o/ /ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung
ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par sems dpa' ste/ de ni bsam pa ltar myi 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal
pa can du 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis sgyu ma dang / smyig rgyu dang / rmyi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang myig yor dang / sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang /
bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni myi nus so/ /smras pa ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar myi 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis
de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni myi nus so/ /smras pa

ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar myi 'grub
cing / dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro/ /ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung
ba dang / bskyang ba dang bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni myi nus so/ /smras pa ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar myi 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang
po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pas/ rmyi lam lta bu'i chos dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams yongs su shes pa dang / de ltar yongs su
shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma rlom
sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems
su myi byed/ sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom
sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed pa yin/ rab 'byor
kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ /gzugs rlom sems su myi byed/ gzugs kyis rlom sems
su myi byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su
myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi
byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems
su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ /tshor ba rlom sems su myi byed/ tshor bas rlom sems su myi byed/ tshor ba la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi
lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems
su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom
sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul
pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes rlom sems su myi byed/ 'du shes kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ 'du shes la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems
su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi
byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi
byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom
sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed rlom sems su
myi byed/ 'du byed kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ 'du byed la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems
su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/
smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/
myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /

ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa rlom sems su myi byed/ rnam par shes pas rlom sems su myi byed/ rnam par
shes pa la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom
sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su
myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom
sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myig rlom sems su myi byed/ myig gis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems
su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi

sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems
su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad rlom sems su myi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis rlom sems su myi
byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems
su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems
su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig
yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/
sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams cad shes pa nyid rlom sems
su myi byed/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ thams cad shes pa nyid la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom
sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems
su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom
sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi
byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rlom sems su myi byed/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam rlom
sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /

de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom
sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul
pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rlom sems su myi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmyi lam
rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la
rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra
brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom
sems su myi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya' pa/ bam po bcu pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs

lha nye phan gyi lha dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor kyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad myed snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha

dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad myed dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad myed snang ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / myi che ba'i lha dang /
myi gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og myin gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas/ bcom
ldan 'das la mngon par gtor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig du 'khod do/ /de nas

rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya' byin dang / myi mjed gyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang /
gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba
sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ /lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab
'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya' byin gyis/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga'
ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po
brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston
pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid
zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ /byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams
kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur
to/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis/ chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su

dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis/ chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba
sems la snang bar gyur to/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis/ chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya' byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba

sems la snang bar gyur to/ /'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis/ chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya' byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ /

steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis/ chos ston pa mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byams pa yang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang / sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /
gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dang / rtags gang dang mtshan ma gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byams pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs

par sangs rgyas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'di la

rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byams pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par
myi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs sdug ces bya
ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par myi
'gyur ro/ /gzugs 'das shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /tshor

ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar

chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba bcings shes bya ba

'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba 'das shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par

myi 'gyur ro/ /'du shes rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /'du shes bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /'du shes bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag

myed ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /'du shes sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /'du shes zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /'du shes

bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /'du shes 'das shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /'du shes ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /'du shes da ltar byung

zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /

'du byed bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar

chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed 'das shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos ston par

myi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal

zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par myi

'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa 'das shes

bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /myig rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag

ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /myig bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /myig bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /myig sdug
ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /myig zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /myig bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston

par myi 'gyur ro/ /myig 'das shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /myig ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /myig da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba rtag ces bya ba

'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /

rna ba sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par

myi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba 'das shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /sna rtag ces bya ba

'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /sna bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /sna bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /

sna sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /sna zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /sna bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par

myi 'gyur ro/ /sna 'das shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /sna ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /sna da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /lce rtag ces bya ba 'am myi

rtag ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /lce bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /lce bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /lce sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug

ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /lce zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /lce bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /lce 'das shes

bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /lce ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /lce da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /lus rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par
myi 'gyur ro/ /lus bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /lus bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /lus sdug ces bya ba 'am
myi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /lus zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /lus bcings shes bya ba 'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /
lus 'das shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /lus ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /lus da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /yid rtag ces bya ba 'am
myi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /yid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /yid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar chos ston par
myi 'gyur ro/ /yid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /yid zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /yid bcings shes bya ba
'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /yid 'das shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /yid ma 'ongs shes bya bar chos ston par myi 'gyur ro/ /yid da ltar byung zhes bya
