rkyen kyis tshor ba la brtson par byed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen kyis tshor ba la brtson par byed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ lus kyi

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la brtson par byed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi sbyor myi

'byed pa de'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la brtson par byed do/ /sa'i khams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe sa'i khams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ sa'i khams la

brtson par byed do/ /chu'i khams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe chu'i khams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ chu'i khams la brtson par byed do/ /mye'i khams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe mye'i khams

la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ mye'i khams la brtson par byed do/ /rlung gi khams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rlung gi khams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rlung gi khams la brtson par byed do/ /
nam mkha'i khams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe nam mkha'i khams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ nam mkha'i khams la brtson par byed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams la myi sbyor myi 'byed

de gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa'i khams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson par byed do/ /ma rig pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe ma rig pa la myi sbyor myi

'byed pa de'i tshe/ ma rig pa la brtson par byed do/ /'du byed la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe 'du byed la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ 'du byed la brtson par byed do/ /rnam par shes pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed

de/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do/ /mying dang gzugs la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe mying dang gzugs la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i

tshe/ mying dang gzugs la brtson par byed do/ /skye mched drug la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe skye mched drug la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ skye mched drug la brtson par byed do/ /reg pa la myi sbyor

myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe reg pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ reg pa la brtson par byed do/ /tshor ba la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe tshor ba la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ tshor ba la brtson par byed do/ /

sred pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe sred pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ sred pa la brtson par byed do/ /len pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed de gang gi tshe len pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ len pa la

brtson par byed do/ /srid pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe srid pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ srid pa la brtson par byed do/ /skye ba la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe skye ba la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa

de'i tshe/ skye ba la brtson par byed do/ /rga shi la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rga shi la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rga shi la brtson par byed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe sbyin pa'i pha

rol tu phyin pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi sbyor myi

'byed pa de'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ bzod pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la brtson par byed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

brtson par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed do/ /nang stong pa

nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe nang stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe phyi stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa

de'i tshe/ phyi stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe phyi nang stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa

nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe chen po stong pa

nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ chen po stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe don dam pa stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ don dam

pa stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe 'dus byas stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /'dus

ma byas stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi

'byed de/ gang gi tshe mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/

gang gi tshe thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe dor ba myed pa

stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rang bzhin stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/

rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe chos thams cad stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la

brtson par byed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /myi dmyigs

pa stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi

tshe dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bi nyid stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la

brtson par byed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtson par byed do/ /yang dag

par spong ba rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe yang dag par spong ba rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtson par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/

gang gi tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtson par byed do/ /dbang po rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe dbang po rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/

dbang po rnams la brtson par byed do/ /stobs rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe stobs rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ stobs rnams la brtson par byed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la myi

sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtson par byed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/
gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par byed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la myi sbyor myi
'byed de/ gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtson par byed do/ /bsam gtan rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe bsam

gtan rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams la brtson par byed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe tshad myed pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ tshad
myed pa rnams la brtson par byed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i

tshe/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par byed do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam par thar pa brgyad la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam
par thar pa brgyad la brtson par byed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa

de'i tshe/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la brtson par byed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam par

thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la brtson par byed do/ /mngon par

shes pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par byed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe ting nge

'dzin rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtson par byed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams

la brtson par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtson par byed do/ /

myi 'jigs pa bzhi la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe myi 'jigs pa bzhi la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la brtson par byed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/

gang gi tshe so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtson par byed do/ /byams pa chen po la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe byams pa chen po la myi

sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ byams pa chen po la brtson par byed do/ /snying rje chen po la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe snying rje chen po la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ snying rje chen po la brtson par byed do/ /sangs rgyas

kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la brtson par byed do/ /

thams cad shes pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe thams cad shes pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ thams cad shes pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la myi sbyor myi

'byed de/ gang gi tshe lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brtson par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la myi sbyor myi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bco lnga pa/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
so/ /gzugs dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba dbus su myi dmyigs
so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes
pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myig sngon gyi mthar

myi dmyigs so/ /myig phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs

so/ /rna ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sna sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lce sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
lus phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid dbus
su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sgra sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sgra phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sgra dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dri sngon
gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dri phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dri dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ro sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ro phyi ma'i mthar
myi dmyigs so/ /ro dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ reg sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myig gi rnam par shes pa sngon gyi
mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba'i rnam par

shes pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sna'i

rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lce'i rnam
par shes pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
lus kyi rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshe/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod pa'i tshe/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i tshe/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod pa'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

kyis tshor ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba

phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sngon gyi mthar

myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
tshe/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor

ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi ma'i

mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sngon gyi mthar

myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i tshe/ sa'i khams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sa'i khams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sa'i khams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chu'i

khams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mye'i khams sngon gyi mthar myi

dmyigs so/ /mye'i khams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mye'i khams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rlung gi khams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi

khams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam mkha'i khams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams phyi ma'i

mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi

ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ma rig pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs

so/ /ma rig pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mying dang gzugs sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ skye mched drug sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ reg pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
tshor ba sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sred pa sngon gyi mthar myi
dmyigs so/ /sred pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sred pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ len pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /len pa phyi ma'i mthar
myi dmyigs so/ /len pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ srid pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa dbus su myi

dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ skye ba sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rga shi sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha

rol tu phyin pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbus su myi dmyigs
so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol

tu phyin pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma'i

mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

phyi stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sngon

gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sngon gyi

mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chen po stong pa nyid sngon

gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sngon
gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus

byas stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa

stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed

pa stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin

stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs

so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid phyi ma'i
mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi

dmyigs pa stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /

dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /

dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams

sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

yang dag par spong ba rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stobs rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stobs rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dbus su myi dmyigs
so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden
pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
bsam gtan rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad myed pa rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /

tshad myed pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sngon gyi mthar
myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa brgyad sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa

dgu dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid

dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

bcu dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi 'jig pa bzhi sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jig pa bzhi phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi dbus

su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /so so

yang dag par rig pa bzhi dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byams pa chen po phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byams pa

chen po dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi

chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams cad shes pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi

dmyigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs

so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyi ma'i

mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa ni zab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /

sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i de

bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i

phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu ro'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg gi de bzhin nyid

zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab

pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin

nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus

te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu

myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /

sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa'i de bzhin

nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i

de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched

drug gi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba'i

par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes

pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i

bu gzungs kyi sgo gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi 'jigs pa bzhi gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gting dpag

dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu thams cad shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /

sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes

pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus

tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa

ti'i bu ro tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos tshad myed pa'i phyir/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i

phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa tshad myed

pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par

shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna

ba'i 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i

'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid

kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad

myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad

myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu

lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mye'i khams tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /

sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /

sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par

shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched drug

tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu len pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed

do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i

bu rga shi tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /

sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i

phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas stong

pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa

ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid tshad myed

pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong

pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag

par spong ba tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dbang po

tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan lag tshad

myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu

'phags pa'i bden pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshad

myed pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa
ti'i bu rnam par thar pa brgyad tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /

sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /

sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi 'jigs pa bzhi tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi tshad myed pa'i phyir/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

bcwo brgyad tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu thams cad shes pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu

lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
tshad myed do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu drug pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
tshe/ gal te gzugs zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
'du shes zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par
shes pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba zab ces

bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te

gzugs zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sgra zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dri zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ro zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

gal te chos zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal

te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna

ba'i 'dus te reg pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen kyis tshor ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab ces
bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sa'i khams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chu'i khams zab ces
bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mye'i khams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rlung gi khams zab ces bya

bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nam mkha'i khams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams zab ces bya

bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ma rig pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mying dang gzugs zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye mched drug zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sred pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

gal te len pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te srid pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye ba zab

ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rga shi zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab ces

bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bzod pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

do/ /gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nang stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chen po stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid zab

ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang bzhin stong pa

nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te

dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dbang po rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stobs rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
bsam gtan rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshad myed pa rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod do/ /gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad zab ces bya bar myi
spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mngon par shes pa rnams zab ces bya bar

myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab ces bya
bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myi 'jigs

pa bzhi zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /

gal te snying rje chen po zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thams cad shes pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi zab pa
nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin no/ /'du shes kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'du shes ma yin no/ /'du byed kyi zab pa nyid
gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /myig gi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ myig ma yin no/ /rna ba'i zab pa

nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba ma yin no/ /sna'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sna ma yin no/ /lce'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lce ma yin no/ /lus kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lus ma yin no/ /
yid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ yid ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no/ /sgra'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sgra ma yin no/ /dri'i zab pa nyid gang yin

pa de ni/ dri ma yin no/ /ro'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ro ma yin no/ /reg gi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ reg ma yin no/ /chos kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ chos ma yin no/ /myig gi rnam

par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i
zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i zab

pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang
yin pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/
sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus
te reg pa ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg
pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus
te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg
pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /sa'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sa'i khams ma yin no/ /chu'i khams

kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ chu'i khams ma yin no/ /mye'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mye'i khams ma yin no/ /rlung gi khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rlung gi khams ma yin no/ /
nam mkha'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ nam mkha'i khams ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/ /ma rig pa'i
zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ma rig pa ma yin no/ /'du byed kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /
mying dang gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mying dang gzugs ma yin no/ /skye mched drug gi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ skye mched drug ma yin no/ /reg pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/

reg pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin no/ /sred pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sred pa ma yin no/ /len pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ len pa ma yin no/ /

srid pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ srid pa ma yin no/ /skye ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba ma yin no/ /rga shi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rga shi ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /bzod

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa ma yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi zab

pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/

chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus byas stong pa

nyid ma yin no/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mtha' las 'das pa

stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang

yin pa de ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de

ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin

pa de ni/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid

gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi zab
pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no/ /dbang po rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po rnams ma yin no/ /stobs rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ stobs
rnams ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin
pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no/ /bsam gtan rnams
kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan rnams ma yin no/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ tshad myed pa rnams ma yin no/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ma
yin no/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /

mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma yin no/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi zab pa
nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa
de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i zab
pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no/ /snying rje chen po'i
zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje chen po ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no/ /
thams cad shes pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma
yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du shes gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar
myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig gting dpag
dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna gting
dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus
gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
gal te gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sgra gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod do/ /gal te dri gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ro gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes

bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i rnam
par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag

dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag

dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor

ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
kyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sa'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod do/ /gal te chu'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mye'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rlung gi khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nam mkha'i khams gting dpag
dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod do/ /gal te ma rig pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mying dang gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar
myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye mched drug gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg pa gting dpag

dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sred pa gting dpag

dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te len pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te srid pa gting

dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rga shi
gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
